00034   RootTreeWriter::RootTreeWriter():Processor("RootTreeWriter")
00035   {
00036 
00037     //***********************************************************
00038     // Add new engines here
00039 //    _writeEngineList.push_back( new EventPropertiesWriteEngine( this )    );
00040 #   include "EnginesAdd.icc"
00041     __RTW::EngineRegistrar::TheInstance().appendAllEngines( _writeEngineList, this );
00042     //***********************************************************
00043 
00044 
00045     _description="Single processor for all the plotting";
00046 
00047     registerProcessorParameter( "OutFileName","Name of the output ROOT file",
00048                                 _rootFileName, std::string("plots.root") );
00049 
00050     registerOptionalParameter( "OutFileMode","Mode for opening ROOT file",
00051                                _rootFileMode, std::string("RECREATE")      );
00052 
00053     registerOptionalParameter( "RootTreeName","Name of the output TTree",
00054                                _rootTreeName, std::string("bigtree") );
00055 
00056     
00059     size_t numEngines = _writeEngineList.size();
00060     //    _engineNames.resize( nu_Engines );
00061     _engineEnable.resize( numEngines );
00062 
00063     size_t engineIndex=0;
00064 
00065     for ( WriteEngineVIt pWE = _writeEngineList.begin(); 
00066           pWE != _writeEngineList.end(); ++pWE          )
00067       {
00068         // _engineNames[procInd] = (*pWE)->getEngineName();
00069         std::string engineName = (*pWE)->getEngineName();
00070         registerProcessorParameter(engineName+"_enable","enable(1) or disable(0) write engine "+engineName,
00071                                    _engineEnable[ engineIndex ], 0                                         );
00072         (*pWE)->registerParameters();
00073         
00074         engineIndex++;
00075       }
00076 
00077   }

00079   bool RootTreeWriter::checkUsedEnginesExist()
00080   {
00083     StringVec paramkeys;
00084     parameters()->getStringKeys(paramkeys);
00085     StringVec enabledEngines;
00086     // collect all enabled engines;
00087     for ( StringVec::iterator keyIt = paramkeys.begin(); keyIt != paramkeys.end(); ++keyIt )
00088       {
00089         size_t suffixPos =  keyIt->find("_enable");
00090         // substring "_enable" at the end of key...
00091         if ( suffixPos != string::npos 
00092              && suffixPos == ( keyIt->size()-string("_enable").size()) )
00093           {
00094             int enabled = parameters()->getIntVal( *keyIt );
00095             if ( enabled !=0 )
00096               {
00097                 string engineName( *keyIt, 0 ,suffixPos );
00098                 enabledEngines.push_back(engineName);
00099               }
00100           }
00101       }
00102     // check all enabled engines for existence
00103     for ( StringVec::iterator engIt = enabledEngines.begin();
00104           engIt != enabledEngines.end(); ++engIt )
00105       {
00106 
00107         WriteEngineVec::iterator foundEngIt = find_if( _writeEngineList.begin(),
00108                                                        _writeEngineList.end(),
00109                                                        RTW::EngineNameIs(*engIt) );
00110         // not found? that's baaaaaaaaad..
00111         if ( foundEngIt == _writeEngineList.end() )
00112           {
00113             cerr << "RootTreeWriter(): Fatal: Engine ["<<*engIt<<"] is enabled but does not exist. "
00114               "Don't know what to do, but to panic. Thus: PANIC!..." << endl;
00115             cerr << "Exit ungraceful!. (Please complain at Marlin authors for missing "
00116               "handling of fatal and non fatal errors... 'kill -9 $$'... )" <<  endl;
00117             exit( -1 );
00118             
00119             return false;
00120           }
00121       }
00122 
00123     return true;
00124   }

00127   void RootTreeWriter::init()
00128   {
00129 
00130     //printParameters( clog );
00131     printParameters();
00132     checkUsedEnginesExist();
00133 
00134     // ------- open output file ----------
00135     _outFile = gROOT->GetFile(_rootFileName.c_str());
00136     if ( _outFile == NULL )
00137       {
00138         _outFile      = new TFile(_rootFileName.c_str(),_rootFileMode.c_str());
00139         _fileOwnerMap[ _outFile ] = this;
00140       }
00142 
00143 
00144     // -------- create tree, register branches -----------------------
00145 
00146     _outFile->cd();
00147     _bigTree = dynamic_cast<TTree*>( _outFile->Get( _rootTreeName.c_str() ));
00148     if ( _bigTree != NULL )
00149       streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Reuse tree ["<<_rootTreeName<<"] " << endl;
00150     if ( _bigTree == NULL )
00151       {
00152         _bigTree = new TTree( _rootTreeName.c_str(), _rootTreeName.c_str());
00153         _treeOwnerMap[_bigTree] = this;
00154         //      _bigTree->SetMaxTreeSize(kMaxLong64);
00155       }
00156     
00157     bool firstProcessor = (_treeFillerMap[ _bigTree ] == NULL );
00158     _treeFillerMap[ _bigTree ] = this;
00159     
00160     if ( firstProcessor )
00161       {
00162         _bigTree->Branch("runNumber"  ,&_runEventStruct.runNumber,  "runNumber/I");
00163         _bigTree->Branch("eventNumber",&_runEventStruct.eventNumber,"eventNumber/I");
00164         _bigTree->Branch("eventTime"  ,&_runEventStruct.eventTime,  "eventTime/L");
00165       }
00166 
00167     size_t engineIndex=0;
00168     for ( WriteEngineVIt pWE = _writeEngineList.begin(); 
00169           pWE != _writeEngineList.end(); ++pWE           )
00170       if ( _engineEnable[engineIndex++] != 0 )
00171         (*pWE)->registerBranches( _bigTree );
00172  }
00173   
00174   void RootTreeWriter::end()
00175   {
00176     if ( _treeOwnerMap[_bigTree] == this )
00177       {
00178         TFile* treeFile = _bigTree->GetCurrentFile();   
00179         treeFile->Write();
00180         delete _bigTree;
00181         _bigTree=NULL;
00182       }
00183 
00184     if ( _fileOwnerMap[_outFile] == this )
00185       {
00186         _outFile->Write();
00187         _outFile->Close();
00188         //delete _outFile;
00189         _outFile=NULL;
00190       }
00191 
00192     for ( WriteEngineVIt pWE = _writeEngineList.begin(); 
00193           pWE != _writeEngineList.end(); ++pWE           )
00194       delete *pWE;
00195 
00196     _writeEngineList.clear();
00197   }
00198 
00199 
00200   void RootTreeWriter::processEvent( LCEvent* evt )
00201     //  void RootTreeWriter::check( LCEvent* evt )
00202   {
00203 
00204     _runEventStruct.runNumber   = evt->getRunNumber();
00205     _runEventStruct.eventNumber = evt->getEventNumber();
00206     _runEventStruct.eventTime   = evt->getTimeStamp();
00207 
00208     size_t engineIndex=0;
00209     for ( WriteEngineVIt pWE = _writeEngineList.begin(); 
00210           pWE != _writeEngineList.end(); ++pWE           )
00211       if ( _engineEnable[engineIndex++] != 0 )
00212         (*pWE)->fillVariables( evt );
00213     
00214     if ( _treeFillerMap[_bigTree] == this )
00215       {
00216         TFile* oldfile = _bigTree->GetCurrentFile();
00217         _bigTree->Fill();
00218         TFile* newfile = _bigTree->GetCurrentFile();
00219         if (oldfile!=newfile)
00220           {
00221             RootTreeWriter* owner = _fileOwnerMap[oldfile];
00222             _fileOwnerMap.erase( oldfile );
00223             _fileOwnerMap[newfile]=owner;
00224           }
00225       }
00226 
00227   }
